name: knoell Germany GmbH
memberOrga: All our affiliates are included in our website: www.knoell.de
goal: knoell Germany GmbH is a scientific regulatory consultancy providing services to the private sector in the areas of risk-assessement and technical support for product registration. knoell Germany GmbH is a private and for-profit organization (family owned) headquarted in Germany and opperating accross several countries in Europe and beyond. Our remit is to provide high-quality dossiers and risk-assessment for product registration accross different regulations: chemicals, agriculture, medical devices, animal health. knoell Germany GmbH supports all technical and scientific aspects during the registration process of chemicals (and other products) in several regions: Europe, Americas, Asia and Africa.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health
euInitiatives: Only technical guidance documents and implementing regulations under the framework of chemicals, plant protection, fertilizers and plant nutrition, food and animal feed, medical devices and animal health.
